title: Avira Blocking Game from Starting.. Help?
body:
The client works fine, and before 8.13 went live I had no problems at all, but now when a game starts the second game window that normally pops up with the loading icons does not appear. Instead, I get a message from Avira stating that it is a malicious attack.

The threat it is recognizing is: TR/Crypt.XPACK.Gen..... a Trojan variant.

The path is: RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.226\deploy\League of Legends_236b4193.exe

I'm not sure why this is happening because it never did this before the patch today (8.13).
